articles.title: Nasser Hussain names four candidates Rob Key must consider for England coaching gig - The Mirror
articles.description: Rob Key has a huge job on his hands after being confirmed as England's new Managing Director of Cricket following a torrid time of late, and now Nasser Hussain has delivered his verdict on who he should consider to hire as coach
articles.content:
Rob Key has been named England's new Managing Director of Men's Cricket and one of the first things he needs to do is appoint a new head coach.
